title: Statement by White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre on the Attack Against Paul Pelosi | The White House
content: The President is praying for Paul Pelosi and for Speaker Pelosi’s whole family. This morning he called Speaker Pelosi to express his support after this horrible attack. He is also very glad that a full recovery is expected. The President continues to condemn all violence, and asks that the family’s desire for privacy be respected.###
